item.title: Set up a webite using bogdown, GitHub, and Ocean Drive
item.description: I am writting this because it took me some long nights to try to figure out how to get started with blogdown. Hopefuly this post helps some others these posts have helped me: In GitHUB Create a repositary, name it as you want and enable a README Click on the green buton “Clone or download” In your terminal Open git bash, select the local directory where you want to clone the GitHub repo git clone https://github.
